description.english: I hate it when people call me!
I'm not going to wash my mouth!
Seriously, what the duck is this?
Why did it had to break just now?
You must be pretty proud of yourself?
Why would you lie about this?
How about it, these things DO exist!

displayName.english: I've got to URN my keep

description.english: This day is going to be something SPECIAL!
Just make up your mind already!

displayName.english: Just blame it all on me!

description.english: You know how this works, right?
You can't stand the heat, huh?
What do you know, I'm not the only one!
I SWEAR this is the last time...
Why did we have to leave before dawn?
And take care of your own business.

displayName.english: Are you SURE you have everything?

description.english: But that's not a good thing, dude!
Gee, I wonder if it was worth it?
This milk went sour AGES ago.
She has a name, but that doesn't mean we can't eat her.
Wait your turn just like everyone else!
I hope you suffocate on that cocktail!
That's how you break the ice.
I've got a bad feeling about this...
Ain't no easy way to say this.

displayName.english: Point him with a sticky end!

description.english: Lock the door next time, okay?

displayName.english: Let's just get this over with

description.english: I can't wait to move on with my life.

displayName.english: What's going to happen to me?

description.english: Wow, it's REALLY bright in here!
Make your own house. save thousands of dollars!
You're the one who passed out.
That last shot was too much...
And you call this a motel.
Bird? Looks more like a finger.
I thought you could read the map.
Get yourself together, you're almost there!
Let's get the "idos" out of the way.

displayName.english: I'm not going to call him

description.english: So some people actually enjoy these kinds of games?
What are you waiting for? A hug?
